desc: Amundson foil boards are designed by John Amundson on the North Shore of Oahu, Hawaii. These boards are the best and most innovative & technically designed foil boards on the market today. Foil boards for surfing, kiting and stand up paddling SUP. Foilsurfing, Kiteboarding, Kiteboard, Stand Up Paddle.

layout.text: DESIGNED, BUILT & TESTED BY FOILERS FOR FOILERS
